decorator.label: Result Decorator
decorator.description: This decorator decorates the result of tests.

decorator.label: Incomplete Testdata Decorator
decorator.description: This decorator decorates Test Suites, Test Cases or Test Steps with missing data as not complete (red cross). Missing data can be - incomplete Test Data - incomplete Object Mapping Parent Test Suites or Test Cases which contain such elements will also be marked as incomplete.

decorator.label: Missing Reference Decorator
decorator.description: Decorates Test Cases with references to Test Cases that do not exist, e.g. if a referenced project is missing.

decorator.label: Excel Decorator
decorator.description: Decorates Test Cases or Test Case References which make use of test data from an external source.

decorator.label: Active Element Decorator
decorator.description: Decorates Test Steps or Test Case References which have been marked as active / inactive.

actionSet.description: only these actions, that are visible in the main menu- or toolbar
actionSet.label: Jubula Menu Action Set

actionSet.description: all actions, that are not in the main menu- or toolbar
actionSet.label: Jubula Global Action Set
